title: YouTube & Rumble View Bot
description: Boost views on YouTube and Rumble videos using residential proxies with country selection

videosToWatch.title: Videos to Watch
videosToWatch.description: List of videos to process. Each video can have its own settings.

refererUrl.title: Referer URL (if Watch Type is 'referer')
refererUrl.description: The URL to set as the referer. Only used if Watch Type is 'referer'.

searchKeywords.title: Search Keywords (if Watch Type is 'search')
searchKeywords.description: Keywords to search for. One will be chosen randomly. Video must be findable with these. Only used if Watch Type is 'search'.

watchTimePercentage.title: Watch Time Percentage
watchTimePercentage.description: Percentage of the video to watch (30-100)

useProxies.title: Use Proxies
useProxies.description: Whether to use proxies for viewing videos

proxyUrls.title: Custom Proxy URLs
proxyUrls.description: Optional list of custom proxy URLs (in addition to Apify Proxy)

proxyCountry.title: Proxy Country
proxyCountry.description: Country code for Apify residential proxies (e.g., US, GB, DE)

concurrencyInterval.title: Concurrency Interval (seconds)
concurrencyInterval.description: Interval in seconds between starting new browser instances

maxSecondsAds.title: Max Seconds for Ads
maxSecondsAds.description: Maximum seconds to watch an ad before attempting to skip

skipAdsAfter.title: Min Ad Watch Time before Skip (seconds, comma-separated if range)
skipAdsAfter.description: Attempt to skip ads after this many seconds (if skippable). Use one value or two for a random range.

autoSkipAds.title: Auto Skip Ads
autoSkipAds.description: Automatically skip ads when the skip button becomes available

stopSpawningOnOverload.title: Stop Spawning on Overload
stopSpawningOnOverload.description: Stop spawning new instances if system (or Apify platform) is at capacity

useAV1.title: Use AV1 Codec (Experimental)
useAV1.description: Attempt to use AV1 video codec if available (browser support varies)
